title: Correction: Ammonium perchlorate: serum dosimetry, neurotoxicity, and resilience of the neonatal rat thyroid system
content: This is a correction to: Mary E Gilbert, Iman Hassan, Katherine L O’Shaughnessy, Carmen Wood, Tammy E Stoker, Cal Riutta, Jermaine L Ford, Ammonium perchlorate: serum dosimetry, neurotoxicity, and resilience of the neonatal rat thyroid system, Toxicological Sciences, 2023;  https://doi.org/10.1093/toxsci/kfad133
